description: Test suite for the 'Agent' class and its interaction with various tools, including tests for synchronous and asynchronous tool usage, stream handling, multiple tool calls, and custom tools within the 'agno' project.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests the agent with YFinanceTools to fetch current stock price for TSLA.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response with tool calls for TSLA stock price.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for fetching TSLA stock price using the agent.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool calls with TSLA stock price.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tools (YFinanceTools and DuckDuckGoTools) for combined query about TSLA and news.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function without parameters for weather in Tokyo.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with optional parameters for weather in a specified city.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests a tool that processes multiple URLs about papers, verifying function calls.
